## Quaternion.unitVectorToUnitVector() method

Creates a quaternion used to rotate a unit vector to another.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static unitVectorToUnitVector(from: Vector3, to: Vector3, result?: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```

</th><th>

The unit vector to be rotated.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)


</td><td>

The destination unit vector.


</td></tr>

result


</td><td>

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The output quaternion, if not specified, a new quaternion will be created.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)
